segments.text: You ’ re making my blood boil .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm about to explode ! You ’ Ve made a mess of this matter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very sorry to hear that you ’ Ve been having so many problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry isn ’ t good enough ! What can you do to help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand why you ’ re angry , Mrs . Wilson , and believe me , we are doing everything in our power to work this out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , obviously , what you ’ re doing is not good enough !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you could just give us a few more days , we should be able to get this straightened out .
segments.speaker: S2
